topic.title: Test shortdesc
topic.shortdesc: This is my shortdesc test. This element right here is all that is being tested by this file. What a waste of hard drive resources! Let's put an image here just for fun: . OK, time to end. After I put in other elements: apiname and b and boolean () and cmdname and codeph and filepath with a varname and i and keyword and menucascade/uicontrol and msgnum and msgph and option and parmname and ph and q and state () and sub and sup and synph and systemoutput and term and tt and u and uicontrol and userinput and varname and wintitle.
